name: OntoUML SDK
body:
### What is OntoUML?

[OntoUML](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OntoUML) is a UML Profile whose elements represent finer-grained distinctions between different kinds of types and encompasses a set of constraints defining the admissible relations between these elements.

### What is the OntoUML SDK?

The OntoUML SDK is composed of two components:

* PrimeOntoUML - the (Ecore) reference metamodel for OntoUML.  
  It's a lightweight version of [Roberto Carraretto's version](http://code.google.com/p/rcarraretto/) (which is based on Eclipse's UML metamodel).
* OntoUML Editor - a textual editor for OntoUML.  
  Available as an Eclipse plugin, the editor integrates with several modelling tools from the [Eclipse Modelling project](http://www.eclipse.org/modeling/).

## Installation

The Eclipse plugins can be obtained from the OntoUML SDK update site, available at:

`http://ontouml.sourceforge.net/eclipse/`

The plugins are intended to be used in Eclipse Juno release.

## The language
